text: I'm going to cook this Chris, right now.
How you going to do it, microwave?
Roasting, place in a baking tray, gas mark five for thirty five minutes.
Cooking time will need to be extended when cooking more than one product at a time.
It is straightforward, thirty five minutes, shall I set thirty five?
Phorr, sticky out there isn't it?
It's not very agreeable at all, is it?
I forgot to take those rotten grapefruits back to Sainsbury's.
No, what, what would that do.
Well I mean that, they don't expect necessarily to see the evidence do they?
